title: Hybl Sports Medicine and Performance Center Program Fund
description: To provide support for programmatic expenses to include, but not limited to, equipment for centers of distinction, laboratories, research, and scholarships in the Hybl Sports Medicine and Performance Center at UCCS.
marketingContent: The state-of-the-art facility will integrate undergraduate and graduate academic programs with clinical practice and research in a sports medicine and performance environment. The center is scheduled to open in April 2020.
